name: Step
description: The AWS::EMR::Step resource creates a unit of work (a job flow step) that you submit to an Amazon Elastic MapReduce (Amazon EMR) cluster. The job flow step contains instructions for processing data on the cluster.

properties.name: ActionOnFailure
properties.description: The action to take if the job flow step fails. Currently, AWS CloudFormation supports CONTINUE and CONTINUE_AND_WAIT. For more information, see Managing Cluster Termination in the Amazon Elastic MapReduce Management Guide.

properties.name: HadoopJarStep
properties.description: The JAR file that includes the main function that Amazon EMR executes.

properties.name: JobFlowId
properties.description: The ID of a cluster in which you want to run this job flow step.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: A name for the job flow step.
